author: jinxjinx550
title: A Great Little Set
review:
It's rare that the smaller LEGO sets have as many rare colors and pieces as this set gives you.  Two dogs -- one of them rare, and the other one super-rare -- are only the beginning.  On top of that there are the many pink and magenta and lime green pieces, but wait -- there's more!  There are dishes, there's a rare brush piece, and there are HOT DOGS!!

I would have bought this set for the hot dogs alone, I think, except that I knew I was getting all those other fabulous items along with them.  I heartily recommend this set.

author: tman684
title: woof woof!
review:
this set is really cool. i bought it just for the hot dogs, but i found out that this set was a lot better because of the rare colors, dogs, and accsesories.

pros: hot dogs, ribbon, dogs, bucket,and colors.

cons: no mni figs
